sources.title: Pagan Lady
sources.description: https://web.archive.org/web/20230326155500/https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Pagan_Lady "Steel is what they fall in love with." Â  - Juvenal

metadata.Plot: A free-spirited bartender on a tropical island has a reputation as a "pagan lady", who hops from man to man and bed to bed. The young son of the island's fire-and-brimstone evangelist arrives on the island, falls in love with her and proposes marriage. The proposal affects her in a way she hadn't planned on.
metadata.Actors: Evelyn Brent, Conrad Nagel, Charles Bickford
